title: Trade Agreement
blocka: Action: Spend two resource dice to initiate trade with a faction.
blockb: Gain a number of new resource dice equal to the disposition of the faction.
blockc: Dice gained and spent should match trade wheel for faction.

title: Development Research
blocka: Action: Purchase one available development. Shuffle into an asset deck.

title: Amber Lodge
tags: Location: Spotlight, Red Bank, Urban, Sorcery
blockb: Immediate: A character at this location may spend 9 progress to remove one condition.

title: Strategic Investments
blocka: Action: Spend 5 fortune to place one progress.
blockb: Immediate: Spend 4 progress to increase any disposition track by one.
blockc: Immediate: Spend 7 progress to increase any resource track by one.

title: Resource Gathering
